property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: The Record ID for loading relevant content based on the component's embdded context.

property.name: contentType
property.label: Managed Content Type
property.description: The type of content to fetch.

property.name: numberContentItems
property.label: Number of Content Items
property.description: The number of content items to return.

property.name: pathAttribute
property.label: CMS Page URL Path
property.description: If you customized your CMS item detail page, update this value with the exact path. By default, it's the same as the content type.

property.name: titleAttribute
property.label: CMS Title Field
property.description: The developer name for the CMS Content attribute for the header text.

property.name: bodyAttribute
property.label: CMS Body Field
property.description: The developer name for the CMS Content attribute for the body text.

property.name: imageAttribute
property.label: CMS Image Field
property.description: The developer name for the CMS Content attribute for the image location. Must have a property titled 'url' for the media asset.

property.name: linkAttribute
property.label: CMS Content URL
property.description: The developer name for the CMS Content attribute for the content URL

property.name: topicMode
property.label: Topic Mode
property.description: Determines if the component returns CMS content associated with a record or a topic
